title: The Metamorphosis
description: Summer soul-searches during a visit from Seth. Taylor pleads for Ryan's help with her marriage. Sandy longs for a guys' night. Julie vows to turn over a new leaf in moving on from Marissa's Death.
list_of_the_cast:

Adam Brody  as  Seth Cohen

Rachel Bilson  as  Summer Roberts

Willa Holland  as  Kaitlin Cooper

William Abadie  as  Jean Claude
